evidence.title: IQVIA GFSS Automation & Analytics Expansion (A&A) – V25
resumeRefs: Led automation and analytics expansion across GFSS, insourcing 200 TCS employees, building automation COE, and deploying 400+ Alteryx workflows.
Delivered enterprise process mining, advanced analytics, and standardized reporting with measurable savings across Finance.

evidence.title: IQVIA Enterprise Data & Analytics Program Review – Business Operations
resumeRefs: Built enterprise reporting platforms across Financials/OPEX, Go-To-Market, and Productivity KPIs using Alteryx, Azure SQL, and Power BI.
Developed dashboards for EBITDA, revenue, sales pipeline, OPEX variance, and business unit performance across global data sources.

evidence.title: Q2 Solutions – Global Controller (IQVIA/Quest JV)
resumeRefs: Oversaw all accounting operations and reporting for the Q² Solutions joint venture between IQVIA and Quest Diagnostics.
Designed and implemented SOX/GAAP controls supporting rapid business expansion and JV compliance.
Led global monthly close processes, intercompany eliminations, and JV financial consolidation.
Partnered with finance, operations, and technology teams to strengthen reporting accuracy and operational performance during rapid growth.

evidence.title: Laurel AG – Proposal, Rental & Warehousing Platform (Project Closure)
resumeRefs: Designed and delivered a complete proposal, rental, and warehousing platform for Laurel AG, spanning design, development, testing, UAT, and hypercare.
Led automation of estimation, rental coordination, and field operations workflows used across the irrigation business.
Established long-term licensing, support, and improvement framework covering product lifecycle, maintenance, and new feature development.
Delivered a functional V1 application supporting core operational processes such as equipment rental, inventory visibility, and proposal generation.

evidence.title: Laurel AG – Proposal Web Platform Features
resumeRefs: Designed and delivered the full Proposal Web Platform for Laurel AG, including opportunity management, multi-stage estimation workflow, CAD extraction, material list automation, task mapping, and proposal generation.
Built complex workflow logic supporting 8-stage operational process from task selection to final document output including NetSuite formatted extracts.
Implemented CSV-based data import validation, labor/product cost management, vendor cost auditing, and automated KPI calculation (GP%, cost variance).

evidence.title: Laurel AG – Licensing, Maintenance & Support SOW
resumeRefs: Defined the licensing, maintenance, and support model for the Laurel AG Web Application Platform, establishing an operational framework for long-term application sustainability.
Created the SLA-driven support structure with incident prioritization, remediation timelines, platform updates, and security patch workflows.
Established platform licensing terms, monthly retainers, and annual prepayment discount structures for enterprise-grade support.

evidence.title: Laurel AG – Rental Application User Manual & Operational Workflow
resumeRefs: Designed and delivered the Rental Application for Laurel AG, supporting real-time equipment rental, delivery, return, inspection, and stock adjustment workflows.

Digitized an 8-stage operational process, replacing manual coordination with a structured system covering order management, delivery routing, customer handover, return logistics, inspection, and warehouse reconciliation.
Implemented master data management for products, warehouses, customers, account managers, and integrated it with a map-based operational interface.
Built validations, routing logic, status tracking, stock adjustments, workflow automation, document attachments, and CSV import/export capabilities.

evidence.title: Laurel AG – Business Documentation for Rental Process Application
resumeRefs: Authored comprehensive business documentation outlining end-to-end rental workflows, customer interactions, data validation patterns, reporting models, and operational controls.
Defined user stories, business rules, and multi-stage rental lifecycle processes across delivery, return, check-out, inspection, and stock adjustment stages.
Captured real operational complexity by modeling customer locations, warehouse structures, recurring orders, master data rules, and order-to-cash logic.

evidence.title: Laurel AG – Technical Specification for Rental Process Application
resumeRefs: Designed full technical architecture for the Rental Process Application, including database schema, backend logic, API layers, validation rules, and master data systems.
Authored a 120-page technical specification covering data models, UI/UX behavior, workflow logic, role-based permissions, map interface integration, and analytics/report generation.
Defined real-time operations algorithms for delivery, check-out, check-in, inspection, recurring orders, stock adjustments, and multi-location inventory tracking.
